name: Dazzle
title: Shadow Priest
lore: Each morning, in the village of Dezun, Dazzle would watch the sun rise, knowing his power over life and death grew stronger.

poisonTouch.name: Poison Touch
poisonTouch.description: Casts a poisonous hex on enemies, slowing them and dealing damage over time.

shallowGrave.name: Shallow Grave
shallowGrave.description: Prevents an ally from dying for a short duration. They cannot drop below 1 HP.

shadowWave.name: Shadow Wave
shadowWave.description: Sends a wave of healing that bounces between allies, damaging enemies near each target.

badJuju.name: Bad Juju
badJuju.description: Dazzle gains armor and reduces ability cooldowns whenever he casts a spell. Enemies near him lose armor.
